num1.description: The first number to be added

num2.description: The second number to be added

num1.description: The first number to be subtracted

num2.description: The second number to be subtracted

num1.description: The first number to be multiplied

num2.description: The second number to be multiplied

num1.description: The first number to be divided

num2.description: The second number to be divided

function.name: remainder
function.description: To find the remainder when one number is divided by another

num2.description: The divisor (number by which division is performed)

function.name: evaluation
function.description: To evaluate a function string with respect to a certain variable

func.description: The function string to be evaluated

x.description: The variable with respect to evaluate to

num.description: The numerical value to evaluate at

function.name: differentiation
function.description: To differentiate a function string with respect to a certain variable

func.description: The function string to be differentiated

x.description: The variable with respect to differentiate to

num.description: Optional: Value to evaluate derivative at

function.name: integration
function.description: To integrate a function string with respect to a certain variable

func.description: The function string to be integrated

x.description: The variable with respect to integrate to

num1.description: Optional: Lower limit for definite integral

num2.description: Optional: Upper limit for definite integral

function.name: sqrt
function.description: Finds the square root of a given number

num.description: The given number whose square root is to be found

function.name: exponentiation
function.description: To raise a number to a power

exponent.description: The exponent to raise the base to

function.name: square_root
function.description: To find the square root of a number

num.description: The number to find the square root of

function.name: logarithm
function.description: To compute the logarithm of a number with a given base

num.description: The number to take the logarithm of

function.name: factorial
function.description: To compute the factorial of a number

num.description: The number to compute the factorial of

function.name: gcd
function.description: To compute the greatest common divisor of two numbers

function.name: lcm
function.description: To compute the least common multiple of two numbers

function.name: absolute_value
function.description: To find the absolute value of a number

num.description: The number to find the absolute value of

function.name: trigonometric
function.description: To evaluate trigonometric functions such as sin, cos, tan

func.description: The trigonometric function (e.g., sin, cos, tan)

function.name: inverse_trigonometric
function.description: To evaluate inverse trigonometric functions such as arcsin, arccos, arctan

func.description: The inverse trigonometric function (e.g., arcsin, arccos, arctan)

value.description: The value to apply the function to

function.name: hyperbolic
function.description: To evaluate hyperbolic functions such as sinh, cosh, tanh

func.description: The hyperbolic function (e.g., sinh, cosh, tanh)

value.description: The value to apply the function to
